attributes.action: Include Psychology as a GCSE Humanity
attributes.additional_details: We are passionate about this subject and want to teach the likes of yr10s and 11s about these subject
attributes.background: We want to have psychology and sociology as a GCSE humanity

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

We're not sure exactly what you'd like the Government or Parliament to do. Both of these subjects are available as GCSEs. Decisions on which subjects to offer are a matter for individual schools.

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
